text: If an association has provided for voting by delegates, any provision of this chapter referring to votes cast by the members shall apply to votes cast by delegates, but this shall not permit delegates to vote by mail.
historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 29-917.

1981 Ed., § 29-1117.

1973 Ed., § 29-817.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-917 has been recodified as § 29A-917.

DC CODE § 29-917

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Voting provisions--Application to voting by delegates.
